TopicTitle: Some noteworthy passenger planes from my collection (747,707 AWACS,777ish,DC-9 ish aircraft, etc)

Articles.Content:
Desided it would most probably be better if i put all these aircraft into one post since they are noething too special. So here are some passenger aircrafts from my personal collection .

Here are some picks of them.

So, first we have the Koeing-747 that flyes pretty well for its size . In order to make it fly as well as it does now i had to make the wings 3 layers thick . (The aircraft is fully stock)

Here is the updated 1.0.5 version of the 747.

Secondly we have the 707-AWACS, a radar/command aircraft modified from the 707 airliner for detecting aircrafts and ships and to direct airgroups to intercept.

This aircraft flyes like it should, aka being able to do a loop de loop without stalling .

And here we have my favourite of the bunch the KRJ-400, my personal transport witch looks like a DC-9ish aircraft but flyes like a well bred fighter-jet . It really is an amazing flyer and it looks pretty nice too even altough i had to add a second layer of wings to make it fly properly. I have done proper aerobatic manouvers with this and it also cabable of flying at mach1 speeds at low altitude.

And here is the 737/777ish aircraft that flyes better than the 707 but not as well as the KRJ-400. There is really noething special about this but i tought that why the hell not, lets put this in here too .

So here is another passenger aircraft turned in to a AWACS aircraft, the KT-5 skycleaner witch is my own custom design. Now this one feels and flyes like a real aircraft (well, a bit hard to say since ive never flown a 4 engined aircraft).

And as a bonus i have for you the KRJ-400-400. This was a very simple and quick build but the aircraft does fly pretty much like a jet-fighter .

So moving on with the AWACS category, i have for you the KC-212 Warning Star (one of my 3 early access survivors) that was the first AWACS aircraft used by the USAF that was a modified Lockheed Super-Constellation.

So there you have it, a bunch of aircrafts from my collection that i desided to show to you guys. So i hope you enjoyed looking at these aircrafts .

NOTE: This post will be updated regularily aka when i make more aircrafts of this category .

Edited November 10, 2015 by kapteenipirk
moar planes!
Nice work! One thing wrong with it though: Your E3-D is actually flying. They tend to spend a lot of their time broken with engineers scratching their heads
Thanks . And yea thats what tends to happen when you use airframes that where developed about 50 to 60 years ago and stuff them up with hightech gizmos .
Truest thing I've heard all day haha
Glorious planes, I love it. Especially that 747.
Nice collection. I'd give you rep but I'm all out for the day.
